name: Mutualism
description:
MADE TO BE PLAYED WITH UNIQUE ALTERNATIVE CONTROLLERS.

Experimental co-op game made for my bachelor's project (2020).

Context
You play as 2 colorful blobs who just got married, and together you must protect your wedding cake from being eaten by hordes of hungry enemy blobs. Holding hands will combine your characters into one stronger, but slower, character, better equipped for defeating certain enemies.

Idea
The game was made to be played with alternative controllers: A Makey Makey device, 2 silver rings and 2 game pads. This setup allows players to combine their characters by the act of physically holding holds with each other.

The game can now be played without Makey Makey: Use either two controllers (Xbox recommended) or keyboard + mouse.

Read more on my site: http://ekadesign.dk/portfolio/mutualism/
